title: rip off
body: I JUST PAID $10 FOR RP AND IT TOOK MY MONEY BUT DIDNT GIVE ME ANY RP {{item:3151}}

replies.body: Riots new RNG system you pay money and may get RP in return

Sometimes the RP isn't given instantly and can sometimes take a few hours to show up in your account (I cant remember the upper limit but it is shown when you purchase RP). 

If you still haven't received your RP in 24 hours please send in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
